articles.author: Eva Dou
articles.title: E.U. says Meta's 'pay or consent' ads violate competition law - The Washington Post
articles.description: Regulators say the tech giant breached the Digital Markets Act in requiring Instagram and Facebook users to pay if they don’t want personal data used to generate targeted ads.
articles.content:
European Union regulators say Meta violated the blocs new competition law in requiring Instagram and Facebook users to pay if they dont want their personal data used to generate targeted ads.

articles.title: Groundbreaking Discovery: How Zinc Could Change Farming Forever - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers have found that zinc significantly influences the nitrogen fixation process in legumes, a discovery that could transform legume-based agriculture. Climate change, drought, increased temperature, and other stressors challenge agricultural sustainab…
articles.content: A new study reveals zinc’s critical role in regulating nitrogen fixation in legumes through a sensor named FUN. This discovery could help improve crop efficiencies and reduce synthetic fertilizer use… [+5220 chars]
